site.tagline: I create full stack solutions for clients and myself. Currently working on multiple projects.

services.title: Transforming Ideas into Intelligent Solutions
services.description: I offer a range of specialized services focused on artificial intelligence and modern web development to help businesses innovate and grow.

aiDevelopment.title: AI Development
aiDevelopment.description: Custom AI solutions tailored to your business needs with state-of-the-art models and algorithms

machineLearning.title: Machine Learning
machineLearning.description: Predictive models that grow smarter over time using your data to deliver actionable insights

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Transform your raw data into actionable insights with advanced visualization techniques

fullStackDevelopment.title: Full-Stack Development

experience.title: Professional Journey
experience.description: A timeline of my career progression.

mcnode.title: Technical Support Specialist
mcnode.description: serve as a Technical Support agent at MC-node, where I handle a range of client requests—from configuring Minecraft servers to building custom panels on VPS setups. I also assisted the owner with various tasks, these tasks required me to take a lot of responsibility.

geffen.title: Software Developer
geffen.description: I develop a large-scale application that helps the company to schedule their teams and manage tasks. From real-time WebSockets to secure roles and permissions, I focus on ensuring a reliable and user-friendly application.

retrii.title: Full-Stack Developer
retrii.description: During my second year of studies, I completed an internship at Retrii, a company known for developing large-scale applications for a variety of clients. This experience significantly enhanced my backend and frontend development skills, and gave me practical insight into professional software practices.

education.title: Educated Minds
education.description: A timeline of my schools and degrees.

hbo.title: Informatica
hbo.description: I am currently enrolled in the Informatica program at Avans University of Applied Sciences. This program focuses on various aspects of computer science, including software development, data management, and information systems. I am excited to further develop my skills and knowledge in this field.

mbo.title: Software Development
mbo.description: I am currently pursuing a degree in Software Development at KW1C, where I am gaining a solid foundation in programming, web development, and software engineering principles. After having great degrees I was asked to continue the school using the fast track. Which will allow me to complete my studies more quickly and efficiently.

vmbo.title: Economics
vmbo.description: I completed my secondary education at BHC, where I focused on economics. This program provided me with a solid foundation in business principles, finance, and management. It also helped me develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills that have been valuable in my subsequent studies and career.

reviews.title: Client Feedback
reviews.description: Hear what clients have to say about their experience working with me.

ingetypt.name: Lucas Peters
ingetypt.review: Michal is an amazing developer, he helps me on almost a daily basis with my small problems. He's highly skilled and good to work with

pinda.name: Jaya van de Pol
pinda.review: Michal is an excellent all-round developer. He helped me with various tasks and challenges, always providing clear guidance and practical solutions. Highly reliable and technically skilled.

contact.title: Let's get in touch
contact.description: Would you want to chat? Or do you have a project to work on? Let me know!
